      public final void drawItemStack(com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack pose, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack, int x, int y, String altText)
      Deprecated.
      Draws an ItemStack.

      The z index is increased by 32 (and not decreased afterwards), and the item is then rendered at z=200.
